_header: This holy time our Lord was born
_description: A Nativity carol — one quatrain (aaab) and burden: ‘Now euery man at my request / Be glad & mery all in this fest’

BodRawC506.Transcription:
This holy tym oure lord was bornTo saue man kynd þat was for
                    lornAs sayd prophetes her befornTherfor be glad all in þis
                    fest
